/prog/cpp/earthmateusb_userland/src/buf.h

00001 /* Functions are or are derived from Al Borchers circular write
00002  * buffering code from the linux pl2303 usb-serial driver.
00003  *
00004  *  Licensed under the GNU GPL, Version 2.
00005  */
00006 
00007 #ifndef BUF_H
00008 #define BUF_H
00009 
00010 /* read/write buffer structure */
00011 struct buf {
00012         unsigned int    buf_size;
00013         char            *buf_buf;
00014         char            *buf_get;
00015         char            *buf_put;
00016         
00017         /* protect buffer with thread mutex */
00018         pthread_mutex_t buf_mutex;
00019 };
00020 
00021 struct buf *buf_alloc(unsigned int size);
00022 void buf_free(struct buf *cb);
00023 void buf_clear(struct buf *cb);
00024 unsigned int buf_data_avail(struct buf *cb);
00025 unsigned int buf_space_avail(struct buf *cb);
00026 unsigned int buf_put(struct buf *cb, const char *buf, unsigned int count);
00027 unsigned int buf_get(struct buf *cb, char *buf, unsigned int count);
00028 
00029 #endif /* BUF_H */
